listitem.para: Whether pluto should perform dnssec validation using libunbound, provided libreswan was compiled with USE_DNSSEC. A value of yes (the default) means pluto should perform DNSSEC validation. Note that pluto reads the file /etc/resolv.conf to determine which nameservers to use.
The location of the DNSSEC root zone public key file. The default is /var/lib/unbound/root.key but this can be changed at compile time.

The location of a file containing additional DNSSEC Trust Anchors. This can be used when a network is using split-DNS and the internal hierarchy is using DNSSEC trust anchors. There is no default value.
